problem_names: lemma scaleQ_add_right: "a *\<^sub>Q x + y = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (a *\<^sub>Q y)"
lemma scaleQ_add_left: "a + b *\<^sub>Q x = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (b *\<^sub>Q x)"
lemma scaleQ_scaleQ [simp]: "a *\<^sub>Q b *\<^sub>Q x = a \<cdot> b *\<^sub>Q x"
lemma mult_scaleQ_left [simp]: "(a *\<^sub>Q x) \<^bold>\<cdot> y = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y"
lemma mult_scaleQ_right [simp]: "x \<^bold>\<cdot> (a *\<^sub>Q y) = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y"
lemma qtimes_assoc: "(x \<^bold>\<cdot> y) \<^bold>\<cdot> z  \<cong>\<^sub>Q  x \<^bold>\<cdot> (y \<^bold>\<cdot> z)"

lemma qtimes_weak_cong_left:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows  "x\<^bold>\<cdot>z \<cong>\<^sub>Q y\<^bold>\<cdot>z"

lemma qtimes_weak_cong_right:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows  "z\<^bold>\<cdot>x \<cong>\<^sub>Q z\<^bold>\<cdot>y"

lemma qinverse_weak_cong:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows   "x\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<cong>\<^sub>Q y\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>"

lemma scaleQ_cong:
  assumes "y \<cong>\<^sub>Q z"
  shows "x *\<^sub>Q y \<cong>\<^sub>Q x *\<^sub>Q z"
translations: lemma scaleQ_add_right: "a *\<^sub>Q x + y = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (a *\<^sub>Q y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a *\<^sub>Q x + y = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (a *\<^sub>Q y)
lemma scaleQ_add_left: "a + b *\<^sub>Q x = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (b *\<^sub>Q x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b *\<^sub>Q x = (a *\<^sub>Q x) + (b *\<^sub>Q x)
lemma scaleQ_scaleQ [simp]: "a *\<^sub>Q b *\<^sub>Q x = a \<cdot> b *\<^sub>Q x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a *\<^sub>Q b *\<^sub>Q x = a \<cdot> b *\<^sub>Q x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. - a *\<^sub>Q x = a *\<^sub>Q - x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a *\<^sub>Q x \<cong>\<^sub>Q (a *\<^sub>Q \<one>) \<^bold>\<cdot> x
lemma mult_scaleQ_left [simp]: "(a *\<^sub>Q x) \<^bold>\<cdot> y = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a *\<^sub>Q x) \<^bold>\<cdot> y = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y
lemma mult_scaleQ_right [simp]: "x \<^bold>\<cdot> (a *\<^sub>Q y) = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<^bold>\<cdot> (a *\<^sub>Q y) = a *\<^sub>Q x \<^bold>\<cdot> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<^bold>\<cdot> y \<cong>\<^sub>Q y \<^bold>\<cdot> x
lemma qtimes_assoc: "(x \<^bold>\<cdot> y) \<^bold>\<cdot> z  \<cong>\<^sub>Q  x \<^bold>\<cdot> (y \<^bold>\<cdot> z)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<^bold>\<cdot> y \<^bold>\<cdot> z \<cong>\<^sub>Q
    x \<^bold>\<cdot> (y \<^bold>\<cdot> z)

text\<open>The following weak congruences will allow for replacing equivalences in contexts
     built from product and inverse. \<close>

lemma qtimes_weak_cong_left:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows  "x\<^bold>\<cdot>z \<cong>\<^sub>Q y\<^bold>\<cdot>z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<^bold>\<cdot> z \<cong>\<^sub>Q y \<^bold>\<cdot> z

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<^bold>\<cdot> z \<cong>\<^sub>Q y \<^bold>\<cdot> z

lemma qtimes_weak_cong_right:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows  "z\<^bold>\<cdot>x \<cong>\<^sub>Q z\<^bold>\<cdot>y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<^bold>\<cdot> x \<cong>\<^sub>Q z \<^bold>\<cdot> y

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. z \<^bold>\<cdot> x \<cong>\<^sub>Q z \<^bold>\<cdot> y

lemma qinverse_weak_cong:
  assumes "x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y"
  shows   "x\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<cong>\<^sub>Q y\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<cong>\<^sub>Q y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<cong>\<^sub>Q y\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>

lemma scaleQ_cong:
  assumes "y \<cong>\<^sub>Q z"
  shows "x *\<^sub>Q y \<cong>\<^sub>Q x *\<^sub>Q z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x *\<^sub>Q y \<cong>\<^sub>Q x *\<^sub>Q z

proof (prove)
using this:
  y \<cong>\<^sub>Q z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x *\<^sub>Q y \<cong>\<^sub>Q x *\<^sub>Q z

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x \<^bold>\<cdot> y)\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<cong>\<^sub>Q
    x\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<^bold>\<cdot> y\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    x \<^bold>\<cdot> x\<^sup>-\<^sup>\<one> \<cong>\<^sub>Q \<one>
